title: Fix: matrix_exp by using correct Pade coefficients
body:
Also adding a non-trivial matrix exponentiation test.
See equivalence of recursive product formula and explicit for coefficients:
https://www.desmos.com/calculator/vkaxjhg28o
Fixes #27. Also fixing the order of matrix multiplication of numerator and denominator.

title: build(openblas-src): lax v0.17 BLAS linking
body:
## Description

- This PR modifies the dependabot upgrade to add blas and openblas-src `extern crate` statements which will tell cargo to explicitly link to BLAS, without which the linker gives `undefined symbol` errors for BLAS symbols like `cblas_dgemv`
- Initially I have set the versions as "*" just to check it works, I will amend these to use the proper versions from the lockfile now

## Type of change

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)

## How has this been tested?

Existing tests all pass :tada:

title: feat(optimize): working Powell, check results are near optimum
body:
## Description

The scirs2-optimize minimize tests did not check the results properly so I edited them to get a better idea of what was working. This PR supplies these fixed tests, which show the following tests not passing:

```bash
cargo nextest run -E "test(minimize)" -p scirs2-optimize
```

```
     Summary [   0.004s] 11 tests run: 6 passed, 5 failed, 12 skipped
        FAIL [   0.002s] scirs2-optimize unconstrained::tests::test_minimize_bfgs_rosenbrock
        FAIL [   0.003s] scirs2-optimize unconstrained::tests::test_minimize_cg_rosenbrock
        FAIL [   0.003s] scirs2-optimize unconstrained::tests::test_minimize_nelder_mead_rosenbrock
        FAIL [   0.002s] scirs2-optimize unconstrained::tests::test_minimize_powell_quadratic
        FAIL [   0.002s] scirs2-optimize unconstrained::tests::test_minimize_powell_rosenbrock
```
